meanings.definition: A person who spreads false and damaging statements about someone.
meanings.sent1: The slanderers in the neighborhood were spreading lies about the new family.
meanings.sent2: The community was hurt by the actions of the slanderers.
meanings.sent3: The gossiping slanderers made up stories about the innocent cat.
meanings.sent4: The slanderers' words were like sharp knives cutting through reputations.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the slanderers, for their words can tarnish even the brightest souls.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the act of making false and damaging statements about others.
meanings.sent1: The slanderers were caught spreading rumors about their classmates.
meanings.sent2: It is important to stand up against the actions of slanderers.
meanings.sent3: The group of slanderers thought they could ruin the party with their lies.
meanings.sent4: The slanderers' words were like poison, infecting the minds of many.
meanings.sent5: The community united to silence the slanderers and protect their own.
